column5: LAKEFRONT OASIS! This luxury, completely remodeled lakefront house in the resort community of Point Venture is a respite from the world in the greater Austin area. Offers some of the best lakefront views of Lake Travis, Marina access, steps away from the pool, golf, hiking/biking, boat ramps, and BBQ, etc.  Large modern kitchen, two large lakefront decks, and two beautiful stone patios right by the water. Sleeps 14 comfortably.
column8: LAKEFRONT OASIS - La Posada at LakeTravis
